name: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
description: The crypto-zoological agency Monarch faces off against a battery of god-sized monsters, including the mighty Godzilla, who collides with Mothra, Rodan, and his ultimate nemesis, the three-headed King Ghidorah.

name: The New Mutants
description: Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves.
cast: Maisie Williams, Anya Taylor-Joy, Alice Braga, Antonio Banderas

name: Spider-Man: Far from Home
description: Following the events of Avengers: Endgame, Spider-Man must step up to take on new threats in a world that has changed forever.
cast: Zendaya, Tom Holland, Marisa Tomei, Jake Gyllenhaal

name: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker
description: The surviving Resistance faces the First Order once more in the final chapter of the Skywalker saga.
cast: Billie Lourd, Adam Driver, Daisy Ridley, Lupita Nyong'o

name: Top Gun: Maverick
description: The plot is unknown at this time.
cast: Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Jon Hamm, Val Kilmer

name: It Chapter Two
description: Twenty-seven years after their first encounter with the terrifying Pennywise, the Losers Club have grown up and moved away, until a devastating phone call brings them back.
cast: James McAvoy, Jessica Chastain, Bill Skarsg√•rd, Bill Hader
